to attend simultaneously to two or more things/to balance (career and family, family and education etc)
to hold concurrent posts/concurrent job/moonlighting

an overall plan taking into account all factors

a second job/supplementary way of making a living
use both carrot and stick/use gentle methods and force/an iron hand in a velvet glove

to travel at double speed/to make all haste

sentences.english: Their technique preferences are both brush stroke mainly expressed in color, and fine brushwork together with freehand brushwork.
sentences.chinese: 从表现技法看，大多偏爱工笔和兼工带写的方法。

sentences.english: Mr Jobs emerges as a controlling and often unsympathetic character.
sentences.chinese: 乔布斯以控制狂兼冷血无情的面目出现。

sentences.english: Common areas include a large living and dining room and a library with walls custom-painted to look like wood paneling.
sentences.chinese: 公共区域包括一间大客厅兼餐厅，以及一间书房。

sentences.english: Describe what the electron blocking layer is, and then express the function of EBL.
sentences.chinese: 说明电子阻挡层是什么，然后表示兼EBL功能。

sentences.english: A facultative pathogen of some insect species commonly used as a biopesticide.
sentences.chinese: 一些昆虫的兼性病原物，常用作生物杀虫剂。

sentences.english: Hui hai behaved calm after listen to, but also to his nephew and general manager of MingWei lectured.
sentences.chinese: 汇海听后表现镇定，还向其侄儿兼总经理明威训话。

sentences.english: More than a third of the workforce is now part-time or temporary employees.
sentences.chinese: 现在超过三分之一的工人成为兼职工或者临时工。

sentences.english: Liuyuxi is an outstanding statesman and exiling poem in middle of Tang Dynasty .
sentences.chinese: 刘禹锡是中唐时期杰出的政治家兼贬谪诗人。

sentences.english: People with a high degree of farsightedness along with astigmatism have less predictable results.
sentences.chinese: 对远视兼散光的人手术后结果的预期较少。

sentences.english: this is our makeshift dining room/margaux’s office.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们临时的饭厅兼margaux的工作室。

sentences.english: Jade chatted, class of chemistry and mathematics teacher Zheng Kun walked into the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 刚聊了两句，班玉任兼数学化学老师郑坤走进了教室。

sentences.english: The second is XiaShi cedar fix colleague, second grade teacher in charge and biology teacher.
sentences.chinese: 柏木修二是夏实的同事，二年级的班主任兼生物教师。

sentences.english: Dai Zhen was a unique scholar during the Qian- Jia time, who was expert at textual research and argumentation.
sentences.chinese: 戴震兼擅义理与考据，在乾嘉学术史上独树一帜。

sentences.english: To simplify the Chinese people, combined to free his left hand, cater to other things.
sentences.chinese: 中国人化繁为简，合二为一，腾出左手，兼做别事。

sentences.english: Mr. Hillme, her social-studies teacher and accompanist, winked at her.
sentences.chinese: 希尔米先生是她的社会课老师兼伴奏，向她眨眼示意。

sentences.english: The office of priest -king was reserved by God for the Messiah, the Lord Jesus alone.
sentences.chinese: 祭司兼君王的位置，上帝唯独保留给弥赛亚主耶稣。
